title: xxcsu
author: xxcsu
content: Stay on 512.77 , don't upgrade to 512.95 .There is a confirmed presence of a mining lock in the 512.95 driver.If you upgraded , don't worry , you can simply reinstall the previous 512.77 drivers and mine at full speed.Make no sense what nVidia doing Read more HERE

comments.author: batsonxl
comments.body: mine 512.15 works nice no crash reported. as soon as i saw full hashrate no way i will do any change to my rigÂ  i have old polaris cards running on phoenix 5.4c with old 2019 drivers
